ModMetaData.name: Altherian Export - Elemental Weaponry
ModMetaData.author: Zomuro, Halno
ModMetaData.description:
Winner of the 2020 Elemental Weapons Art Contest in the Rimworld Art Discord.
Elemental weapons designed by the illustrious HALCYZOM Corporation for your various (nefarious) needs! HALCYZOM weaponry is only sold on their own orbital traders, though some black market blueprints are floating around.
Load order: After Harmony, Rimworld + DLCs, and Vanilla Weapons Expanded- Laser.
Currently not compatible with CE.
Credits: Zomuro: Code Halno: Artwork
